problem.markdown:
1. In a mechanism with input link 30cm and coupler 40cm, what is the magnitude of velocity of Output link at an instant when the coupler forms a right angle with the input link and both input and coupler are rotating at an angular speed of 1rad/s?
(x) 50cm/s () 10cm/s () 35cm/s () 70cm/s
3. For parallelogram linkage (length of input and output are same, length of coupler and fixed link are same) ?
() Input velocity = Output velocity () Velocity of fixed link is zero () Angular velocity of coupler is zero (x) All given statements are correct
4. For a constant input angular velocity which of the following is true always?
() angular velocity of coupler and output are both constant () angular velocity of coupler is constant (x) None of these () angular velocity of output is constant
5. Which of the following has angular acceleration zero always?
(x) All of these () Input link with constant angular acceleration () Output link in parallelogram linkage with constant input angular velocity () Coupler link in parallelogram linkage
